value.title: Power BI reports for consumers (end users)
value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to navigate and use Power BI reports for consumers, or end users. This is geared towards someone not really familiar with the Power BI interface or how to use Power BI reports to their fullest.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hbHs91E8MBw" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8ASw-J0PuN8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI XMLA Endpoint: Why you should care
value.excerpt: The XMLA Endpoint in Power BI can be very powerful. Adam looks at what it is and how to get started with it. If you are using Power BI Premium or Premium Per User, you need to know about this!  Live Stream Question: https://youtu.be/_SLFZiA3peU?t=1229  XMLA Endpoint Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-connect-tools

value.title: RLS with TWO Fact tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you struggled with using Row-Level Security (RLS) on a dimension connected to two fact tables? value.title: To Pivot or Unpivot? That is the question!
value.excerpt: Sometimes your data isn't shaped the right way. Have you tried the Pivot or Unpivot methods in Power Query? They can help get your data looking the right way for your Power BI reports!  Pivot columns https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/pivot-columns  Unpivot columns https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/unpivot-column

value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI with Extra Options   Summarize Function in DAX
value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how you can use GROUPBY function in DAX to create an aggregated table. In this video, I'll explain how you can use Summarize function for the same purpose. Summarize function gives you more control on how to create your aggregated table with some extra functions. Let's
